basic.blooming: Succulent plant, open flower in summer and autunm
basic.color: Leaf color grey green; flower color yellow，white and pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Enjoy sufficient sunlight, put in places with bright scattered sunlight in summer
maintenance.watering: Reduce water in its ecdysis period, keep moist in other seasons
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely
